questions.subject: computer science
questions.question: What does the control unit do?

choices.data: holds all the registers
performs all the calculations in the CPU
coordinates all the components of the cpu
holds all the registers
performs all the calculations in the CPU
coordinates all the components of the cpu
holds all the registers
performs all the calculations in the CPU
coordinates all the components of the cpu

questions.subject: computer science
questions.question: What does the arithmetic logic unit do?

choices.data: holds the results of arithmatic calculations
performs arithmetic and logical operations on data
coordinates all the components of the CPU
stores the results of the calculations
sends control signals to parts of the CPU
decodes instructions

questions.subject: computer science
questions.topic: Structure and function of the processor
questions.question: What does the current instruction register do?

choices.data: stores all the instructions that are to be executed
stores the address of the current instruction to be executed
it temporarily stores the instruction that is currently being decoded or executed

questions.subject: computer science
questions.question: What does the memory address register do?

choices.data: sends address signals to other parts of the CPU
stores memory addresses for data that is being fetched or stored
reads addresses from main memory

questions.subject: computer science
questions.question: What does the memory data register do?

choices.data: temporarily holds the data that is being transferred to and from memory
stores the address of the next piece of data to be fetched
sends read or write signals to Main memory

questions.subject: computer science
questions.question: Name the three buses in a CPU?

choices.data: control, arithmetic, system
data, memory, logic
control, address, data

questions.subject: computer science
questions.question: What does the address bus do?

choices.data: carries memory addresses that identify where the data is being read from or written to
sends read or write signals to Main memory
stores memory addresses for data that is being fetched or stored

questions.subject: computer science
questions.question: What does the data bus do?

choices.data: carries the binary 1's and 0's that make up the actual information being transmitted around the CPU
coordinates all the components of the cpu
sends read or write signals to Main memory

questions.subject: computer science
questions.question: What does the control bus do?

choices.data: controls all the instructions that are fetched
temporarily stores the instruction that is currently being decoded or executed
carries control and command signals to and from every other component of the CPU
